metadata.name: SSR-Chan Remastered
metadata.description:
You know how videogames works, there is always space for a remaster.

You found HER Again! You found the most special one! There is a very low probability of unlocking her, and you were the chosen one! You know how much time you spent in the videogame to reach this point; you are in the endgame, you look back, and you can see all the other waifus that helped you.  
Now, with SSR-Chan, you lived happily ever after.  
Good job!
